atDirectives.name: @apply
atDirectives.description: Use @apply to inline any existing utility classes into your own custom CSS.

atDirectives.name: @layer
atDirectives.description: Use @layer to tell Tailwind which "bucket" a set of custom styles belong to.

atDirectives.name: @tailwind
atDirectives.description: Use @tailwind to insert Tailwind's base, components, utilities and screens styles into your CSS.

atDirectives.name: @responsive
atDirectives.description: Generate responsive variants of utilities by wrapping their definitions in the @responsive directive.

atDirectives.name: @screen
atDirectives.description: Create media queries that reference your breakpoints by name instead of duplicating their values in your own CSS.

atDirectives.name: @variants
atDirectives.description: Generate variants for your own utilities by wrapping their definitions in the @variants directive.

atDirectives.name: @theme
atDirectives.description: Tailwind CSS v4 directive for defining theme configuration inline.

atDirectives.name: @custom-variant
atDirectives.description: Tailwind CSS v4 directive for defining custom variants.

atDirectives.name: @config
atDirectives.description: Tailwind CSS v4 directive for configuration.

atDirectives.name: @import
atDirectives.description: Import external stylesheets or other CSS files.
